resources.string:
This app uses some features of your device location sensor to give you the best experience.

Please go to SETTINGS and click PERMISSIONS section to grant the permission.
Access to the location service is required to show you the route from your current location to nearest location...
To save the downloaded file, the app needs permission to write on disk

This app requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'PermissionDemo\'.
You denied a permission.\nThe app may not without these permissions.
